newsitem.title: USA: Blyth Holdings names Colby acting CFO.
newsitem.headline: Blyth Holdings names Colby acting CFO.

text.p: Blyth Holdings Inc. said Tuesday it named David Colby acting chief financial officer and said the company has converted the last of its convertible debentures issued June 2, 1996.
Colby is one of the company's directors. Colby is a director of the company.

"Now that the debentures are not a factor, an element of uncertainty of investing in Blyth Holdings has been eliminated," said Colby. "I am excited to expand my role as a director and share my experience with this vibrant company."
Colby has previously served as CFO of organizations such as Columbia Health Care Corp and American Medical Response.
No further information on the CFO position was immediately available.
